short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A few screensavers I've made for ChromeOS, with the ability to change idle delay and a selection of animated screensavers!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_U:
A few screensavers I've made for ChromeOS, with the ability to change idle delay and a selection of animated screensavers!

Changelog:
- 2.0: Added a settings pane, and two new screensavers:
    - Gravitional Point
    - Colourful Clocks
- 1.0: Initial release
long.en_GB,es: crappy screensaver I put together when learning how 3D rendering works, I find it entertaining at least
